entry.title: Calculate cash flows in python
entry.content:
Q: Bob began setting aside $5,000 per year in an equity fund at the age of 25. He has turned 30, and has just made another deposit into the fund. The fund has returned 4% annually. How much does Bob have in his account today?

A:

{% codeblock %}

contribution at age

[(i, 5000)for i in range(25, 30+1)] [(25, 5000), (26, 5000), (27, 5000), (28, 5000), (29, 5000), (30, 5000)]

sum([5000*pow(1.05, i-25) for i in range(25, 30+1)]) 34009.5640625 {% endcodeblock %}
